text: at this point this season you've
probably already grilled all the usual
suspects but have you tried grilling
clams and mussels I dumped all of the
coals smack in the middle of the grill
and I let the heat build so you want to
just scrub all of your shellfish inside
before you come out to the grill just
take a brush some cold running water
that's all you need and then just dump
them right into the pan for the broth I
used a little bit of chili flakes some
white wine some olive oil this is
basically a way to steam on the grill so
you get all those good garlicky flavors
but then you also get the smoky flavor
from the grill clams need more time than
mussels to cook so I started cooking the
clams and then I added the mussel flavor
clams and mussels are done when they
start to open what you do is just keep
checking them remove the ones as they
open and then let the other ones
continue to cook until they open also at
the very end it's almost like a
deconstructed pesto meets a gremolata
I used mint and some lemon zest sliced
almonds garlic and it just brought all
the flavors together this is definitely
a dish where you want a nice loaf of
bread to just stop up all those juices
Oh
